column1: The children's father wanted to know what every one wanted on their pizza. @entity2 wanted a strawberry on his pizza. @entity0 thought that was funny. @entity0 asked if anyone wanted chicken on the pizza. @entity1 did not want chicken. @entity2 wanted chicken. @entity3 did not want chicken, but their father wanted to get chicken on the pizza. @entity3 asked if they could have mushrooms on the pizza. @entity0 did not like mushrooms. @entity2 and @entity1 wanted to have mushrooms, so their father had them put mushrooms on the pizza. @entity1 wanted to have green onions on the pizza. @entity0 also wanted green onions. @entity3 and @entity2 did not like green onions, so they did not get green onions on the pizza. @entity0 wanted to order thin crust pizza. @entity3 thought that thin crust pizza had the taste of an old shoe. @entity1 thought @entity3 was wrong. @entity1 wanted thin crust pizza also. @entity2 wanted thick crust pizza. He did not want thin crust, so their father ordered the pizza with thick crust. The pizza was very good and they ate it all.
@placeholder did not want thin crust pizza
